name: Dragonpaw Engine Demo-Final Exam Ver.
description: NOTE: I was unable to test the Mac version of this game. It MAY work, but I can guarantee 110% functionality of the Windows version. I created my own engine mods to bring this project to life, as it's been a passion project that I've left on the backburner for quite a while. The file size is a bit large, but that's because the actual game (not accessed in this particular demo) is already a few hours long, and has over 150 rooms!...it isn't quite finished yet, though. Please follow @ghostscreen.studios on Instagram for development updates!
